summary: A drama centered on a go-go dancer with multiple personality disorder who struggles to remain her true self and begins working with a psychotherapist to uncover the mystery of the inner ghosts that haunt her.

keywords: multiple personality|go go dancer|racist|multiple personality disorder|female protagonist
title: Frankie & Alice
